By E

Modern shapes combined with traditional Indonesian craftsmanship.

A collection full of contemporary, complete and fresh products that you can buy and resell under your own brand. The style is natural, handcrafted and calm.

Why work with us

A collection full of contemporary, complete and fresh products that customers can buy and resell under their own brand. The style is natural, handcrafted and calm

Why by from us?

We are an international company: European origin based in Indonesia

We operate in different areas and cultures. Being a fusion of a European and an Indonesian company and also living and having customers and shops internationally makes us aware of the different cultures and values on both /.s of the world. We can look from both the International as well as the local perspective and from both the production as well as the consumer’s point of view. This smoothens many layers in design, communication, logistics and production.

Experience is what we’re known for

Bastiaan has already been designing and producing ‘white label furniture’  for renowned and successful international furniture brands for years. The extensive experience of developing and producing for other brands has enabled us to see that our designs and products are very well received by /. consumers in many different countries and markets.

Our production takes place in our Elements Factory

ByE works together with Elements Factory based in Indonesia. Therefore it can control its development and production processes and implement its own vision and values. We are there from the initial design until the finished product. Our skillful team members work closely together with the craftsmen to get the right products. Being present at the source gives us control over every step in the process; from the sourcing of materials all the way through the production process.

See the full collection in our catalogue

In our catalogue you will see our most recent range of furniture and accessories that you can order and brand with your own label.

Go to our catalogue

Our story

As a Dutch kid Bastiaan grew up in Indonesia, making it his first home and giving him a thorough understanding of the Javanese culture, crafts, materials and possibilities. Combining his family’s extensive manufacturing experience and production facilities and his own design and economics background has laid the foundation for ByE..
